text: <@U0Z81GL6S>: please have that discussion either here or in email, so that we can all benefit and participate
thanks for the clarification <@U0PB67X4K>. so it looks like the approach of just checking whether a transaction is in the block yes/no will not work to confirm if it has truly succeeded.
I had deployed the asset_management chaincode without specifying the metadata. I then tried to invoke the assign function and the transaction got added into block even though it failed...
